import React,{useEffect,useState} from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ozanerturk/covid19-turkey-api/master/dataset/timeline.json") .then(res=>setVeri(res.data[tarih])) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) ,[veri],[tarih]}) function App() { const[veri,setVeri]=useState(""); const[tarih,setTarih]=useState(""); return (

setTarih(e.target.value)}/>
